mapper.sql: id, code, name, is_lease, sbtype_one, sbtype_two, sbtype_three, sbmodel_code, tech_code, factory, prod_date, prod_code, ma_code, ma_start_date, ma_end_date, proof, proof_code, license, arrive_date, use_date, comp, contranct, buy_price, is_new, ware, is_rfid, asset_code, status, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, version
mapper.insert: insert into sb_equipment_t (code, name, is_lease, sbtype_one, sbtype_two, sbtype_three, sbmodel_code, tech_code, factory, prod_date, prod_code, ma_code, ma_start_date, ma_end_date, proof, proof_code, license, arrive_date, use_date, comp, contranct, buy_price, is_new, ware, is_rfid, asset_code, status, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, version ) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLease,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sbtypeOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbtypeTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbtypeThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbmodelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{techCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{prodCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{maEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{proof,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proofCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arriveDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{useDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{comp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contranct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isNew,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ware,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isRfid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{assetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: update sb_equipment_t set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_lease = #{isLease,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sbtype_one = #{sbtypeOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sbtype_two = #{sbtypeTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sbtype_three = #{sbtypeThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sbmodel_code = #{sbmodelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tech_code = #{techCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factory = #{factory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_date = #{prodDate,jdbcType=DATE}, prod_code = #{prodCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ma_code = #{maCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ma_start_date = #{maStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ma_end_date = #{maEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, proof = #{proof,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proof_code = #{proofCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, license = #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrive_date = #{arriveDate,jdbcType=DATE}, use_date = #{useDate,jdbcType=DATE}, comp = #{comp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contranct = #{contranct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buy_price = #{buyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_new = #{isNew,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ware = #{ware,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_rfid = #{isRfid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, asset_code = #{assetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select t.*,t1.name as sbtype_one_name,t2.name as sbtype_two_name,t3.name as sbtype_three_name,t4.name as sbmodel_name from sb_equipment_t t left join sb_type t1 on t.sbtype_one=t1.code and t1.status=1 left join sb_type t2 on t.sbtype_two=t2.code and t2.status=1 left join sb_type t3 on t.sbtype_three=t3.code and t3.status=1 left join sb_model t4 on t.sbmodel_code=t4.code and t4.status=1
1=1 and t.status = 1
AND t.code like '%#{code}%'
AND t.name like '%#{name}%'
